name: Recuperar y enviar la data adquirida offline
Seleccionar y eliminar data de la última semana
Para realizar las librerías se trabajaron originalmente con estos sensores
A partir de ello y viendo que se repite para más de un sensor, se agruparon por códigos.
(Revisar igual el IODD del sensor que trabajes)
add or conv data
GET MASTER PROPERTIES
func:
msg.payload = {
  "code": "request",
  "cid": 1,
  "adr": "/getdatamulti",
  "data": {
    "datatosend": [
      "/deviceinfo/productcode",
      "/deviceinfo/serialnumber",
      "/deviceinfo/fieldbustype",
      "/deviceinfo/devicefamily",
      "/processdatamaster/temperature",
      "/processdatamaster/temperature/unit",
      "/processdatamaster/voltage",
      "/processdatamaster/voltage/unit",
      "/processdatamaster/supervisionstatus",
      "/processdatamaster/current",
      "/processdatamaster/current/unit",
      
    ]
  }
}
    
return msg;

name: function 5
GET MASTER DATA
func:
msg.payload ={
  "code": "request",
  "cid": 1,
  "adr": "/getdatamulti",
  "data": {
    "datatosend": [
      "/iolinkmaster/port[1]/iolinkdevice/status",
      "/iolinkmaster/port[1]/iolinkdevice/serial",
      "/iolinkmaster/port[1]/iolinkdevice/productname",
      "/iolinkmaster/port[1]/iolinkdevice/pdin",

      "/iolinkmaster/port[2]/iolinkdevice/status",
      "/iolinkmaster/port[2]/iolinkdevice/serial",
      "/iolinkmaster/port[2]/iolinkdevice/productname",
      "/iolinkmaster/port[2]/iolinkdevice/pdin",

      "/iolinkmaster/port[3]/iolinkdevice/status",
      "/iolinkmaster/port[3]/iolinkdevice/serial",
      "/iolinkmaster/port[3]/iolinkdevice/productname",
      "/iolinkmaster/port[3]/iolinkdevice/pdin",

      "/iolinkmaster/port[4]/iolinkdevice/status",
      "/iolinkmaster/port[4]/iolinkdevice/serial",
      "/iolinkmaster/port[4]/iolinkdevice/productname",
      "/iolinkmaster/port[4]/iolinkdevice/pdin",

      "/iolinkmaster/port[5]/iolinkdevice/status",
      "/iolinkmaster/port[5]/iolinkdevice/serial",
      "/iolinkmaster/port[5]/iolinkdevice/productname",
      "/iolinkmaster/port[5]/iolinkdevice/pdin",

      "/iolinkmaster/port[6]/iolinkdevice/status",
      "/iolinkmaster/port[6]/iolinkdevice/serial",
      "/iolinkmaster/port[6]/iolinkdevice/productname",
      "/iolinkmaster/port[6]/iolinkdevice/pdin",

      "/iolinkmaster/port[7]/iolinkdevice/status",
      "/iolinkmaster/port[7]/iolinkdevice/serial",
      "/iolinkmaster/port[7]/iolinkdevice/productname",
      "/iolinkmaster/port[7]/iolinkdevice/pdin",

      "/iolinkmaster/port[8]/iolinkdevice/status",
      "/iolinkmaster/port[8]/iolinkdevice/serial",
      "/iolinkmaster/port[8]/iolinkdevice/productname",
      "/iolinkmaster/port[8]/iolinkdevice/pdin",
  
    ]
  }
}
    
return msg;

name: function 4
GET PORT DATA
function 2
function 103
function 103
func:
msg.topic = "INSERT INTO `offline_data` (`data`) VALUES ('"+ msg.payload + "');";
return msg;

name: server connection
obtener primer dato
func:
msg.topic = "SELECT data FROM offline_data LIMIT 1;";
return msg;

name: Procesar para mqtt
Eliminar dato enviado
function 104
server connection
function 103
func:
msg.topic = "INSERT INTO `local_data_temperatures` (`date`, `data`) VALUES (FROM_UNIXTIME(" + msg.timestamp/1000 + "),'"+ msg.payload + "');";
return msg;

name: Filter local data (Editable)
DELETE ALL
convert to serial and data
adding iolink to global
function 92
func:
msg.payload = { "name": "Vehículo", "lat": msg.payload.lat, "lon": msg.payload.lon }

return msg;

name: function 93
func:
msg.payload = msg.payload.speedKmph
return msg;

name: longitud
func:
msg.payload = msg.payload.lon;
return msg;

name: latitud
func:
msg.payload = msg.payload.lat;
return msg;

name: altitud
func:
msg.payload = msg.payload.alt;
return msg;

name: numero de satelites
func:
msg.payload = msg.payload.numSat;
return msg;
